trans-unit.source: You can use the [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) cmdlet to directly call the functions or methods of a DSC resource (The **Get-TargetResource**, **Set-TargetResource**, and **Test-TargetResource** functions of a MOF-based resource, or the **Get**, **Set**, and **Test** methods of a class-based resource).
trans-unit.target: You can use the [Invoke-DscResource](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt517869.aspx) cmdlet to directly call the functions or methods of a DSC resource (The **Get-TargetResource**, **Set-TargetResource**, and **Test-TargetResource** functions of a MOF-based resource, or the **Get**, **Set**, and **Test** methods of a class-based resource).

trans-unit.source: This can be used by third-parties that want to use DSC resources, or as a helpful tool while developing resources.
trans-unit.target: This can be used by third-parties that want to use DSC resources, or as a helpful tool while developing resources.

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is typically used in combination with a metaconfiguration property `refreshMode = 'Disabled'`, but it can be used no matter what **refreshMode** is set to.
trans-unit.target: This cmdlet is typically used in combination with a metaconfiguration property `refreshMode = 'Disabled'`, but it can be used no matter what **refreshMode** is set to.

trans-unit.source: When calling the **Invoke-DscResource** cmdlet, you specify which method or function to call by using the **Method** parameter.
trans-unit.target: When calling the **Invoke-DscResource** cmdlet, you specify which method or function to call by using the **Method** parameter.

trans-unit.source: You specify the properties of the resource by passing a hashtable as the value of the **Property** parameter.
trans-unit.target: You specify the properties of the resource by passing a hashtable as the value of the **Property** parameter.

trans-unit.source: The following are examples of directly calling resource methods:
trans-unit.target: The following are examples of directly calling resource methods:

trans-unit.source: Test that a file is present
trans-unit.target: Test that a file is present

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Directly calling composite resource methods is not supported.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** Directly calling composite resource methods is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the methods of the underlying resources that make up the composite resource.
trans-unit.target: Instead, call the methods of the underlying resources that make up the composite resource.

trans-unit.source: [Writing a custom DSC resource with MOF](authoringResourceMOF.md)
trans-unit.target: [Writing a custom DSC resource with MOF](authoringResourceMOF.md)

trans-unit.source: [Writing a custom DSC resource with PowerShell classes](authoringResourceClass.md)
trans-unit.target: [Writing a custom DSC resource with PowerShell classes](authoringResourceClass.md)
